events.message: I received my order yesterday but the item is not what I expected. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request related to an unsatisfactory product received by the customer.
A customer service agent specializing in refunds has been assigned to the case to assist the customer further.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your item and get a refund. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the product is unopened or if it has any damage?
The order number is #123456789. The item is unopened but I just don’t want it anymore because it doesn’t match the description.
Thank you for the information. We can process your refund once you send the unopened item back using the prepaid return shipping label we will provide.
That sounds good, thank you. I will send the package tomorrow and let you know once it is shipped.
We have received your returned item and processed the refund. The amount should be back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and to check if you need any further assistance from us.
We are closing this case as resolved. Please contact us again if you have any other questions or concerns. Have a great day!
